issue.title: [Packaging] The patch version was lost in the 4.0.1 release process
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12897](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12897). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I'm not exactly sure what happened, the rc1 _has_ 4.0.1 in the relevant places: https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/release-4.0.1-rc1/r/DESCRIPTION#L3
but the release branch does not seem to have it: 
https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/release-4.0.1/r/DESCRIPTION#L3

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12897?focusedCommentId=17352719) by Jonathan Keane (jonkeane):*
It looks like there are three commits on the -rc branch that aren't in the 4.0.1 branch: https://github.com/apache/arrow/compare/release-4.0.1...release-4.0.1-rc1

And the comparable ones are in the 4.0.0 branch: https://github.com/apache/arrow/commits/release-4.0.0

Can we "just" apply those three commits from release-4.0.1-rc1 to release-4.0.1?
